body: Imagina ser un policía yendo a rescatar a una chica secuestrada, y la encuentras teniendo sexo con perros por voluntad propia.
We need a sequal. I'm assuming she ends up getting all his property including the dogs via the legal system.
yeah i mean she gave off a demonic look like go to hell geezer
that page 27.. lol the look on her face.. i cant stop laughing
